title: Slim pickings
brief_description: Using plasticene animation and miniature sets, motion control camera work and in camera effects, “Slim pickings” is a short animation mixing Hitchcock suspense with classic tragedy. On a hungry planet, a close friendship is tested. Cinematography by David Stevens.
